# Src Folder Overview

Frontend Svelte application with pages, components, and API client.

## Subfolders
- `pages/`: Route components (Home.svelte, Groups.svelte, Brackets.svelte)
- `lib/`: Utilities, API client (api.ts)

## Files
- `main.ts`: App entry point, router setup
- `Layout.svelte`: Navigation and layout wrapper
- `app.css`: Global styles

## Key Functions in api.ts
- `getState()`: Fetches current tournament state
- `addPlayer(name: string)`: Adds player via API
- `startGroupStage()`: Starts group phase
- `submitMatch(id: string, results: any)`: Submits match results
- `generateBrackets()`: Generates playoff brackets
- `submitBracketWinner(id: string, winnerId: string)`: Advances bracket winner
- `resetTournament()`: Resets tournament data

## Key Components in pages/
- `Home.svelte`: Player registration, start tournament, reset
- `Groups.svelte`: Displays pods, matches, submits results, generates brackets
- `Brackets.svelte`: Interactive playoff bracket, advances winners, shows standings
